channel.title: How do I change the hit on a spell

item.title: How do I change the hit on a spell
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

if (spellID == 1189 && playerRights >= 3)
ProjectileSpellPlayer(87, 88, 89, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 14, 1, 433, 434, 435, 2, 1, 2);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(579, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(582, castOnPlayer.absY+1, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(572, castOnPlayer.absY-1, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(67, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX-1);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(67, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX+1);
attackPlayersWithin(453, 20 + misc.random(playerLevel[6] / 6), 4);
hitDiff = 20 + misc.random(50);

}

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the hit on a spell

item.title: How do I change the hit on a spell
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

[code]if (spellID == 1189 && playerRights >= 3)
ProjectileSpellPlayer(87, 88, 89, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 14, 1, 433, 434, 435, 2, 1, 2);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(579, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);

castOnPlayer.stillgfx(67, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX+1);
hitDiff = 20 + misc.random(50);

}
[/code]
Try that, if you get an error post it

item.title: How do I change the hit on a spell
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

[code]if (magicID == 1189){ // Fire wave
ProjectileSpell(579, 582, 572, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 14, 1, 433, 434, 435, 2, 1, 2);
stillgfx(399, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
stillgfx(67, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
stillgfx(67, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
stillgfx(67, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
stillgfx(67, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);

}
[/code]

Took out: attackPlayersWithin(453, 20 + misc.random(playerLevel[6] / 5), 4);
if it doesn’t work, put under the las gfx

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the hit on a spell

item.title: How do I change the hit on a spell
item.dc:creator: @gurt gurt
item.description:
@gurt wrote:

How do I change hit on a spell? lets say I want to hit 50-80 what do I need to do to do that?

Heres the code for the spell

[code]if (magicID == 1189){ // Fire wave
ProjectileSpell(87, 88, 89, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 14, 1, 433, 434, 435, 2, 1, 2);
stillgfx(399, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
stillgfx(67, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
stillgfx(67, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
stillgfx(67, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
stillgfx(67, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
attackPlayersWithin(453, 20 + misc.random(playerLevel[6] / 5), 4);

}[/code]

[code]if (spellID == 1189) { // Fire wave
ProjectileSpellPlayer(87, 88, 89, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 14, 1, 433, 434, 435, 2, 1, 2);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(399, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(67, castOnPlayer.absY+1, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(67, castOnPlayer.absY-1, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(67, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX-1);
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(67, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX+1);
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
attackPlayersWithin(453, 20 + misc.random(playerLevel[6] / 6), 4);
hitDiff = 15 + misc.random(playerLevel[6] / 5);

}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the hit on a spell
